article: Thanksgiving Day is an American national holiday . It usually lasts four days . Americans celebrate it on the fourth Thursday of November each year . It ' s a time for people to give thanks to God , and it ' s also a time for family members to get together . Thanksgiving Day is like a warm family meeting . On the Eve of Thanksgiving , members of the family will drive and even fly home . The next day , they sit around the table , enjoying a traditional dinner together . Turkey , sweet potatoes and a pudding are always ready for the Thanksgiving dinner . Thanksgiving Day is also a day for students to give thanks to parents and teachers who give them help and who love them very much .
